reviewText: First saw this movie on cable, and loved it.  Found the DVD on Amazon, and decided to order it.  The disk plays well ... and I've now watched it several times.
This indie film is terrific.  The characters, the plot, actors, setting, sound track, etc.  I bought 11 DVDS as Christmas gifts this year.
It won't play in my DVD..something about the regional code (???)...waiting for seller to send label so I can return the purchase and get my refund
